headline: Revvity Board Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., January 23, 2025--The Board of Directors of Revvity (NYSE: RVTY), today declared a regular quarterly dividend of $0.07 per share of common stock. This dividend is payable on May 9, 2025 to all shareholders of record at the close of business on April 18, 2025.

headline: Will Revvity (RVTY) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
summary: Revvity (RVTY) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.
